name: Sailing ! Rou's shark-type submarine
description:
move = arrow key

Eat  = [Z]  key

Torpedo = [X] key

Hydro cannon = [C] key

Eating an enemy restores the torpedo's stock.

Eating a certain amount of fish restores the energy gauge and HP of the hydrocannon.

If the game is too heavy, try playing the standalone version.

Underwater drones have gone wild and the peace of the sea is in danger

Lou modifies a shark-shaped submarine, originally built to surprise tourists, into a fighting machine and heads out to sea alone.
